beforeText: Nothing has ever landed on the far side of the Moon yet.
afterText: Chinese probe Chang'e 4 becomes the first human-made object to land on the far side of the Moon.

beforeText: Cosmonaut Valeri Polyakov is going to outer space.
afterText: Cosmonaut Valeri Polyakov returned after setting a record for 438 days in outer space.

beforeText: The Berlin Wall divided one side of the city from the other.
afterText: The Berlin Wall was gone and Berlin was united.

beforeText: No one knows what is the internet yet.
afterText: Time Berners-Lee proposed The World Wide Web at CERN.

beforeText: No one knows what is cloud computing yet.
Ursula Kroeber Le Guin is not born yet.
afterText: Acclaimed writer Ursula Kroeber Le Guin was born.
Nintendo was founded as a playing card company.

beforeText: No one knows who is William Shakespeare yet.
